item.title: A gold-framed Trump mug shot is hanging just outside of the Oval Office
item.description: President Trump's mug shot is one of the first things visitors will see when approaching the Oval Office.

item.title: How Trump's tariffs on steel and aluminum could hit you at the grocery store
item.description: U.S. tariffs could cause the prices of steel and aluminum cans to rise, an increase that may ultimately be passed on to consumers.
